name: DZSimpleGame
description:
Heyy so this is my third game i ever make , in my previous games i was so bad at making menus , graphics , and level making, and comunicating with the player "like instructions and stuf " , and other minor things .

So now all am gonna ask is a simple feedback , what am i leaking, what should i do better and wht i shouldn't do and thanks in advance .

Sorry the game was too short and not perfectly designed , i just had some other things to do.

Heyy , and dont' hesitate to ask if you like the game and you want me to add something to it , it would be my pleasure.

Now for the music credits :
